DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the effects of filgotinib versus placebo in adults with active rheumatoid arthritis (RA) who have an inadequate response to methotrexate (MTX).
DOC.brief_title: Filgotinib in Combination With Methotrexate in Adults With Moderately to Severely Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Have an Inadequate Response to Methotrexate
DOC.criteria: Have a diagnosis of RA (2010 ACR/EULAR criteria) , and are ACR functional class IIII. Have ≥ 6 swollen joints (from a swollen joint count based on 66 joints (SJC66)) and ≥ 6 tender joints (from a tender joint count based on 68 joints (TJC68)) at both screening and Day 1. Ongoing treatment with a stable dose of MTX Previous treatment with any janus kinase (JAK) inhibitor
